message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your specific needs and valued at $150 by you. Considering its high quality and unique features, I believe it would greatly benefit you. To ensure we both get the most out of this transaction, I propose a special introductory price of $140 for you. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a product that is worth more to you than its face value. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.
